alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 10:31AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Montgomery County through 1100 AM CDT... At 1030 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oden, or 11 miles west of Mount Ida, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Norman... Oden... Mimosa... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Mauldin... Black Springs... Gibbs... Pencil Bluff... Pine Ridge... Silver... Sims... Story... Hurricane Grove... Washita... Caddo Gap... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
